cab.content: CABINET.MUNICIPAL ELECTIONS.Note by the Prime Minister.CABINET Ministers arid Ministers above the rank of Under-secretary should not participate in Municipal Elections.C. R. A.10 Downing Street, S.W. 1,4th October, 1945.Printed for the Cabinet. October 1945.SECRET. Copy No. 55CP. (45) 203.4th October, 1945.
